meanings.definition: To gather together in one place
meanings.sent1: The students will assemble in the gym for the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: The family will assemble at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The toys decided to assemble in the toy chest for a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed to assemble in the night sky, creating a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The ants quickly assemble to carry the food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: To fit together the separate component parts of a machine or structure
meanings.sent1: The mechanic will assemble the car engine with precision.
meanings.sent2: It takes time to assemble the pieces of a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The robots decided to assemble themselves into a giant robot tower for fun.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to assemble into the shape of a dragon in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter can quickly assemble the wooden shelves for the new bookshop.

meanings.definition: To come together for a common purpose
meanings.sent1: The team will assemble to discuss the game strategy.
meanings.sent2: Neighbors will assemble to clean up the park together.
meanings.sent3: The birds decided to assemble on the tree branch for a chirping competition.
meanings.sent4: The thoughts in his mind started to assemble into a clear plan.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients will assemble in the pot to create a delicious soup.
